snp5.2:1040: "Kodha santusito loke,Kassa no santi iñjitā;Ko ubhantamabhiññāya,Majjhe mantā na lippati;Kaṁ brūsi mahāpurisoti,Ko idha sibbinimaccagā".
snp5.2:1041: "Kāmesu brahmacariyavā,Vītataṇho sadā sato;Saṅkhāya nibbuto bhikkhu,Tassa no santi iñjitā.
snp5.2:1042: So ubhantamabhiññāya,Majjhe mantā na lippati;Taṁ brūmi mahāpurisoti,So idha sibbinimaccagā"ti.
